contentrichtext.text: {{Infobox Belgium Municipality |name=Boussu |picture=Boussu_050817_(32).jpg |picture-legend= |map=Boussu_Hainaut_Belgium_Map.png |map-legend=Location of Boussu in Hainaut |arms=Blason ville be Boussu (Hainaut).svg |flag=Flag of Boussu.svg |region={{BE-REG-WAL}} |community={{BE-FR}} |province={{BE-PROV-HT}} |arrondissement=[[Arrondissement of Mons|Mons]] |nis=53014 |pyramid-date= |0-19= |20-64= |65= |foreigners= |foreigners-date= |mayor=Jean-Claude Debiève |majority=[[Socialist Party (francophone Belgium)|PS]] |postal-codes=7300, 7301 |telephone-area=065 |web=[http://www.boussu.be/ www.boussu.be] |lat_deg=50 |lat_min=26 |lon_deg=03 |lon_min=48 }} '''Boussu''' is a [[Wallonia|Walloon]] [[municipality]] located in the [[Belgium|Belgian]] province of [[Hainaut (province)|Hainaut]]. As of January 1, 2006, Boussu had a total population of 20,058. The total area is 20.01 km², which gives a [[population density]] of 1,002 inhabitants per km². [[Grand Hornu]], an early 19th-century planned industrial city, is located in [[Hornu]], a former municipality which is now part of Boussu. [[Image:Boussu_050817_(20).JPG|thumb|left|'''Boussu''', the Thierry de Hennin Liétard funerary memorial (1406-1430).|250px]] ==Famous inhabitants== *[[Marcel Moreau]], writer ==References== {{reflist}} {{commonscat}} {{Hainaut}} [[Category:Municipalities of Hainaut (province)]] {{Hainaut-geo-stub}}
